name: The Shelter (zivfo, campostella)
description:
[The Shelter]

After a heavy snow,  people trapped on the moutain fled to your doorstep...the only place nearby that can be taken as shelter ,  your small inn.

Take them inside till rescure come in days !

BUT BE CAREFUL !   Reports said a serial KILLER mixed in the crowd

He takes the life of a random person nearby CONSTANTLY  

Use your wisdom and the help of the detective to find him , and prevent innocents from being murdered !

[Operation]

Select character by mouse and hold , Then :

Press R to rotate

Press T to change shape

[Known issues]

1) if the character shows rotation in weird angles,  restart the game.

2) if no message shown on the mid bottom panel after a new day,  that means the killer is either :

     i) having no targets nearby

    ii) nearby  the detective

3) "nearby" means two character adjoin at least one side.  Not Diagonally

4) many in game sfx is missing ...(almost made it to the deadline, sad

5) if you want to play the game but really can't run the pc build.  Plz come again after the voting week is over :)
